title: Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count
descriptions:
### Perfect Your Craft with Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count

#### Durable & Time-Tested Quality
Experience the unparalleled craftsmanship of Ticonderoga Pencils, a brand with over 100 years of tradition. Our pencils are renowned for their exceptional quality and reliability, trusted by professionals and educators alike.

#### Exclusive #2 Graphite Formula
Enjoy smooth and consistent lines with our #2 exclusive graphite formula. Perfect for sketching, drawing, and writing, these pencils provide the smoothness you need for your most creative projects.

#### Premium, Responsibly Sourced Wood
Our pencils are crafted from premium wood, sourced from responsibly managed forests. Each pencil is a testament to our commitment to sustainability and the environment.

#### Golden Yellow, Matte Finish
Admire the elegant golden yellow lacquered finish, coated with a matte finish that gives your work a professional touch. The golden hue is a signature of Ticonderoga, making your creations stand out.

#### Pre-Sharpened for Convenience
Save time and effort with our pre-sharpened pencils. Simply pick and write, drawing beautiful and consistent lines every time.

#### Latex-Free, Smudge-Free Erasers
Our erasers are made from latex-free material, ensuring they remove marks completely without smudging. The signature green and gold ferrule adds an extra touch of elegance.

#### PMA Certified Non-Toxic
Rest assured that our pencils are PMA certified non-toxic, making them safe for use in both professional and educational settings.

#### Preferred by Teachers and Professionals
Ticonderoga pencils are a favorite among teachers and professionals for their reliability and performance. Trust them to enhance your creativity and precision.

---

**Limited Quantity Available!** Order now and discover the perfect tool for your next masterpiece.

**30 Count Pack - Enough for Your Next Creative Adventure!**
